meanings.definition: Covered in sparkly decorations or sequins.
meanings.sent1: The spangly dress shimmered under the lights.
meanings.sent2: She wore a spangly top to the party.
meanings.sent3: The spangly shoes caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent4: Her spangly earrings twinkled like stars.
meanings.sent5: The spangly decorations made the room feel magical.

meanings.sent1: The spangly ornaments on the tree sparkled beautifully.
meanings.sent2: The spangly wrapping paper reflected the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The spangly crown made him look like a prince.
meanings.sent4: Her spangly phone case was like a mirror.
meanings.sent5: The spangly tiara made her feel like a queen.

meanings.sent1: The spangly disco ball lit up the dance floor.
meanings.sent2: The spangly necklace glinted in the sun.
meanings.sent3: The spangly car attracted a lot of attention.
meanings.sent4: His spangly belt gleamed in the spotlight.
meanings.sent5: The spangly chandelier added elegance to the room.
